title: NFL ATL: Free agency recap, 'Go Get My Sandwich' scoreboard
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Free agency recap, 'Go Get My Sandwich' scoreboard
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- delivers its final word on free agency, picking apart all of the biggest moves of the past week, including Darrelle Revis’ arrival in Foxborough, Eric Decker’s move to the New York Jets and Steve Smith’s release from the Carolina Panthers. Elsewhere, the gang puts the Oakland Raiders’ front office under the microscope and analyzes the merits of Cincinnati Bengals coach Marvin Lewis’ new contract extension. Find out who owes delicious Dagwoods and saucy subs as the podcast recaps the inaugural instalment of ‘Go Get My Sandwich.’ What kind of hero is Marc promising to the other heroes? There’s only one way to find out -- by tuning into the latest episode of the “Around The League Podcast.” Don’t forget to join the conversation on Twitter by tweeting @NFL_ATL and be sure to submit your very own intro tag by using the hashtag #MoneyTags.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
